alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 15 at 5:48PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall in thunderstorms is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following county, Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Heavy rainfall in high terrain areas could rapidly result in flowing flood waters in lower lying areas such as slot canyons and valley washes. Strong gusty winds over 50 mph will also be possible with these thunderstorms. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor for the issuance of Flash Flood Warnings this afternoon and evening and be prepared to take action should they be issued.
